Source code for canopy_storage_module

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""Canopy storage Function."""

import numpy as np
from core.verticalwaterbalance import parameters as pm



[docs]def daily_canopy_storage(canopy_storage_state,
                         daily_leaf_area_index,
                         potential_evap,
                         precipitation,
                         land_area_frac):
    """
    Calulate daily canopy storage.

    Parameters
    ----------
    canopy_storage_state : array
        Daily canopy stroage,  Units: mm
    daily_leaf_area_index : array
       Daily leaf area index  Units: (-)
    potential_evap : array
        Daily potential  evapotranspiration,  Units: mm/day
    precipitation : array
        Daily precipitation,  Units: mm/day
    land_area_frac : array
      Land area fraction,  Units: %

    Returns
    -------
    canopy_storage_state : array
        Daily canopy stroage,  Units: mm
    throughfall : array
        Throughfall,  Units: mm
    canopy_evap : array
        Canopy evaporation,  Units: mm
    pet_to_soil : array
        Remaining energy for addtional evaporation from soil, Units: mm
    land_storage_change_sum : array
        Sum of change in vertical balance storages, Units: mm
    """
    # =========================================================================
    # Adapt for change in land area fraction on canopy storage
    # =========================================================================
    canopy_storage_state = canopy_storage_state * land_area_frac
    initial_storage = canopy_storage_state

    # =================================================================
    # Calculating maxumum storage and canopy storage deficit
    # =================================================================
    max_canopy_storage = pm.max_storage_coefficient * daily_leaf_area_index
    canopy_storage_difference = max_canopy_storage - canopy_storage_state

    # =================================================================
    # Calculating throughfall and canopy storage
    # ================================================================
    throughfall = np.where(precipitation < canopy_storage_difference, 0,
                           precipitation - canopy_storage_difference)

    throughfall = np.where(daily_leaf_area_index > 0,
                           throughfall, precipitation)

    canopy_storage_state_new = \
        np.where(precipitation < canopy_storage_difference,
                 canopy_storage_state + precipitation,
                 max_canopy_storage)

    # =================================================================
    # Calculating Canopy Evaporation
    # ================================================================
    # Check non zero division for  canopy_storage and  max_canopy_storage
    # required for canopy evaporation

    canopy_storage_fraction = np.divide(canopy_storage_state_new,
                                        max_canopy_storage,
                                        out=np.zeros_like(max_canopy_storage),
                                        where=max_canopy_storage != 0)

    # Note!! canopy_evap_cal is a helper variable which is then passed to the
    # actual variable 'canopy_evap' after comparison with the canopy storage
    canopy_evap_cal = potential_evap * canopy_storage_fraction**(2 / 3)

    canopy_evap = np.where(canopy_evap_cal > canopy_storage_state_new,
                           canopy_storage_state_new, canopy_evap_cal)
    canopy_evap = np.where(daily_leaf_area_index > 0,
                           canopy_evap, 0)
    canopy_evap = np.where(land_area_frac <= 0, 0, canopy_evap)

    # =========================================================================
    # Calculating potential evapotranspiration to soil (Pet_to_soil
    # =========================================================================
    # Note!!! not all PET is used for canopy evaporation. Part goes to the soil
    # if caonpy _evap > canopy storage, soil PET is left after substracting
    # else soil PET is  PET - canopy_evap

    pet_to_soil = np.where(canopy_evap_cal > canopy_storage_state_new,
                           potential_evap - canopy_storage_state_new,
                           potential_evap - canopy_evap_cal)

    pet_to_soil = np.where(daily_leaf_area_index > 0, pet_to_soil,
                           potential_evap)
    pet_to_soil[pet_to_soil < 0] = 0

    canopy_storage_state_new = \
        np.where(canopy_evap_cal > canopy_storage_state_new, 0,
                 canopy_storage_state_new - canopy_evap_cal)

    # =================================================================
    # Calculating Canopy storage
    # ================================================================
    canopy_storage_state = np.where(daily_leaf_area_index > 0,
                                    canopy_storage_state_new,
                                    canopy_storage_state)

    land_storage_change_sum = canopy_storage_state - initial_storage

    canopy_storage_state = np.where(land_area_frac <= 0, 0,
                                    canopy_storage_state)

    return canopy_storage_state, throughfall, canopy_evap, pet_to_soil, \
        land_storage_change_sum
